author: hwright
msg: Merge r36540, r36554, r36567 from trunk:
We need a special error code to test for, to resolve issue #3242.
Adding error codes changes our public API, so I nominate this part for
1.6.0. The usage of this error code can wait for 1.6.1.
r36540 adds the error code, r36554 adds a @since and r36567 updates
@since to 1.6.0 for this backport. (r36567 should be reverted on trunk
if this revision is not merged into 1.6.0)

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Move the r36540 group to Approved.
